Articles.Content:
520!

#morehype
1 hour left of siesta
@KerbalSpaceP just retweeted what maxmaps tweeted an hour ago

> 
> should this thread be in the world book of records for most pps, or what?

Or what.

> 
> should this thread be in the world book of records for most pps, or what?

yes it should!

> 
> should this thread be in the world book of records for most pps, or what?

Yes. Probably beat the 0.24 train at some points.

> 
> As my mother always said, if you've got nothing hype to say, don't say it!

Sadly we have a freedom of speach. And yes, I'm anxious, but I don't tend to mashup my keyboard as fast as I can to show it.
Fasteeeer

> 
> Views: 232,325

needs moar I tell you, MOARP!!:KLjsdfkl;sadkj

> 
> 520 blaze it

Were are forest firing it now
More hype! More hype people! We're not fast enough yet!

> 
> No, still there

[![image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg](http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg)](http://s1374.photobucket.com/user/Engineer-Of-Stuff/media/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg.html)
KSP twitter retweeted Max [https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/592718164007452673](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/592718164007452673)
The whole universe is collapsing on himself

> 
> Or what.

Hey, you're almost at 2k posts~

> 
> Can't. We consumed the internet about 150 pages back.

Dont you mean 200!

Hypeway to the danger zone,

Gonna take you right into the danger zone...

They'll never say hello to you til you get it in a red-line overload, 

you never know what you can do til you get it up as hyped as you can go!

> 
> [http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg](http://i1374.photobucket.com/albums/ag401/Engineer-Of-Stuff/image.jpg1_zpsak1ip9nc.jpg)

I had that on my iphone earlier.

and still do.
#I #hate #hashtags #but #hype #made #me #crazy #pls #release #already!

> 
> Hey, you're almost at 2k posts~

I missed by 1337th post battling the hype walls.

RIP in peace.

45 minutes since the SteamDB update.

Edit: 200th post.

> 
> Sadly we have a freedom of speach. And yes, I'm anxious, but I don't tend to mashup my keyboard as fast as I can to show it.

It was this strange concept called a "joke". Seriously, have a bit of fun!

> 
> Hey, you're almost at 2k posts~

Hey, i'm at 1k ahahah
Ted just tweeted "[release hype intensifies]"
12 minutes IMHO.
